request.description: PUT json message returns Pipewrench configuration as json

body.raw:
name: dev.employee
group: edh_dev_employee
databaseType: mysql
schema: employees
jdbcUrl: "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/employees"
username: employee
objectType: table
metadata:
  SOURCE: employee database
  LOAD_FREQUENCY: Daily
  CONTACT: developer@phdata.io
hdfsPath: "hdfs://ns/user/developer/db"
hadoopUser: ps_dev_employee
passwordFile: hdfs://user/developer/.employee_db_password
destinationDatabase: dev_employees

name: dev.employee
connection_manager: ''
sqoop_password_file: hdfs://user/developer/.employee_db_password
source_database:
  name: employees
  cmd: mysql
staging_database:
  path: hdfs://ns/user/developer/db
  name: dev_employees
impala_cmd: impala-shell
sqoop_job_name_suffix: dev.employee
type_mapping: type-mapping.yml
user_name: employee
tables:
- source:
    name: departments
  primary_keys:
  - dept_no
  split_by_column: dept_no
  id: departments
  columns:
  - name: dept_no
    datatype: CHAR
    comment: ''
  - name: dept_name
    datatype: VARCHAR
    comment: ''
  metadata:
    LOAD_FREQUENCY: Daily
    CONTACT: developer@phdata.io
    SOURCE: employee database
  kudu:
    hash_by:
    - dept_no
    num_partitions: 2
  destination:
    name: departments
- source:
    name: dept_emp
  primary_keys:
  - emp_no
  - dept_no
  split_by_column: emp_no
  id: dept_emp
  columns:
  - name: emp_no
    datatype: INTEGER
    comment: ''
  - name: dept_no
    datatype: CHAR
    comment: ''
  - name: from_date
    datatype: DATE
    comment: ''
  - name: to_date
    datatype: DATE
    comment: ''
  metadata:
    LOAD_FREQUENCY: Daily
    CONTACT: developer@phdata.io
    SOURCE: employee database
  kudu:
    hash_by:
    - emp_no
    - dept_no
    num_partitions: 2
  destination:
    name: dept_emp
- source:
    name: dept_manager
  primary_keys:
  - emp_no
  - dept_no
  split_by_column: emp_no
  id: dept_manager
  columns:
  - name: emp_no
    datatype: INTEGER
    comment: ''
  - name: dept_no
    datatype: CHAR
    comment: ''
  - name: from_date
    datatype: DATE
    comment: ''
  - name: to_date
    datatype: DATE
    comment: ''
  metadata:
    LOAD_FREQUENCY: Daily
    CONTACT: developer@phdata.io
    SOURCE: employee database
  kudu:
    hash_by:
    - emp_no
    - dept_no
    num_partitions: 2
  destination:
    name: dept_manager
- source:
    name: employees
  primary_keys:
  - emp_no
  split_by_column: emp_no
  id: employees
  columns:
  - name: emp_no
    datatype: INTEGER
    comment: ''
  - name: birth_date
    datatype: DATE
    comment: ''
  - name: first_name
    datatype: VARCHAR
    comment: ''
  - name: last_name
    datatype: VARCHAR
    comment: ''
  - name: gender
    datatype: CHAR
    comment: ''
  - name: hire_date
    datatype: DATE
    comment: ''
  metadata:
    LOAD_FREQUENCY: Daily
    CONTACT: developer@phdata.io
    SOURCE: employee database
  kudu:
    hash_by:
    - emp_no
    num_partitions: 2
  destination:
    name: employees
- source:
    name: salaries
  primary_keys:
  - emp_no
  - from_date
  split_by_column: emp_no
  id: salaries
  columns:
  - name: emp_no
    datatype: INTEGER
    comment: ''
  - name: salary
    datatype: INTEGER
    comment: ''
  - name: from_date
    datatype: DATE
    comment: ''
  - name: to_date
    datatype: DATE
    comment: ''
  metadata:
    LOAD_FREQUENCY: Daily
    CONTACT: developer@phdata.io
    SOURCE: employee database
  kudu:
    hash_by:
    - emp_no
    - from_date
    num_partitions: 2
  destination:
    name: salaries
- source:
    name: titles
  primary_keys:
  - emp_no
  - title
  - from_date
  split_by_column: emp_no
  id: titles
  columns:
  - name: emp_no
    datatype: INTEGER
    comment: ''
  - name: title
    datatype: VARCHAR
    comment: ''
  - name: from_date
    datatype: DATE
    comment: ''
  - name: to_date
    datatype: DATE
    comment: ''
  metadata:
    LOAD_FREQUENCY: Daily
    CONTACT: developer@phdata.io
    SOURCE: employee database
  kudu:
    hash_by:
    - emp_no
    - title
    - from_date
    num_partitions: 2
  destination:
    name: titles
group: edh_dev_employee

request.description: Write Pipewrench configuration with yaml support

body.raw:
name: dev.employee
group: edh_dev_employee
databaseType: mysql
schema: employees
jdbcUrl: "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/employees"
username: employee
objectType: table
metadata:
  SOURCE: employee database
  LOAD_FREQUENCY: Daily
  CONTACT: developer@phdata.io
hdfsPath: "hdfs://ns/user/developer/db"
hadoopUser: ps_dev_employee
passwordFile: hdfs://user/developer/.employee_db_password
destinationDatabase: dev_employees

request.description: Writes Pipewrench environment with yaml support
Executes pipewrenge-merge and writes the output folder to the configured directory.
PUT json message returns Pipewrench configuration as json
